entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -23.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -23.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 43 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -32.5°C
Wind: WNW 46 km/h gust 72 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 29 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
